name: immaculateness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being immaculate (= perfect, clean, or without any mistakes): I admired the technical immaculateness of the music, but wasn't moved by it. They are most frequently criticized for their very immaculateness. Synonym
immaculacyRelated word
immaculate
More examplesFewer examplesWe do not insist on immaculateness or punctuality.In a biblical context, the moon is often interpreted as a sign of purity and immaculateness. It is easy to be inhibited by an immaculateness so overwhelming that nothing will ever be accomplished.The birds seem to judge potential mates by the immaculateness of their feathers.
